title.narrative: 8.3. EXTERNAL RELATIONS, RISK COMMUNICATION AND COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT

description.narrative: Public alliances and communications are strengthened leading to increased awareness and understanding of child deprivations and child rightsin a coordinated manner., which contributes to Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme effectiveness is achieved with enhanced coordination, partnerships, planning, monitoring, evaluation, reporting, innovation and fit-for-purpose operational support.
